page.title: 02New Forest Ponies.
page.content: Visitors to the{New Forest}will soon discover one of the attractions of the area.Throughout the forest you will observe ponies roaming around.These ponies belong to people called "{New {Forest Commoners}".These are people with the right to graze their animals on the open forest. The{New Forest Ponies}are a hardy breed, who are used to staying out in the open in all weathers and throughout the year . Between March and July the foals are born,with most of them arriving in May.During the summer months visitors to the area can be found taking many pictures of the foals and their mothers,but it is dangerous to approach the rear of a pony as they have a very powerful kick.Unfortunately each year many pones also become victims of road accidents.
